to reduce in amount degree intensity: to shorten (a word or phrase) by omitting letters  substituting shorter forms  etc.  so that the shortened form can represent the whole word or phrase  as ft. for foot  ab. for about  R.I. for Rhode Island  NW for Northwest  or Xn for Christian.
not normal  average  typical  or usual
to bring forth a fetus from the uterus before the fetus is viable
to depart in a sudden and secret manner  especially to avoid capture and legal prosecution
so lost in thought that one does not realize what one is doing  what is happening  etc.
to suck up or drink in (a liquid)
